title: Optimisation of fermentation conditions for the production of gamma-aminobutyric acid (GABA)-rich soy sauce
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Chong Shin Yee, Zul Ilham, Acga Cheng, Muhamad Hafiz Abd Rahim, Siti Hajar-Azhari, Mohd Hafis Yuswan, Nurul Aqilah Mohd Zaini, Anna Reale, Tiziana Di Renzo, Wan Abd Al Qadr Imad Wan-Mohtar
